content:
Ruoming Pang is going to make

 

more money than Mark Zuckerberg,

 

more money than Tim Cook,

 

more money than Sundar Pichai,

 

more money than Satya Nadella,

 

more money than Mark Zuckerberg, Tim Cook, Sundar Pichai and Satya Nadella, COMBINED!

 

Imagine bumping into him in the Metaâ€™s office.

 

What would you say to him?
